wikipedia_page.main: Dame Rachel Elizabeth Waterhouse  (2 January 1923 – 14 October 2020) was an English local historian, consumer affairs activist and writer.

response: In more recent times a new Lunar Society was formed in Birmingham by a group led by Dame Rachel Waterhouse. Its aim is to play a leading part in the development of the city and the wider region.Lunar Society award to Rachel Waterhouse.
** Rachel Waterhouse, English historian and author (d. 2020)
*January 2 – Rachel Waterhouse, English historian and author (died 2020)

response: The Lunar Society of Birmingham, a local learned society re-founded by Dame Rachel Waterhouse, is headquartered in Shirley, Solihull.https://lunarsociety.org.uk/contact/
